main_definition: To move or travel toward a specific location or person, typically after having been away.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To arrive at a place or position.
meanings_and_examples.example: The bus will come in 10 minutes.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To become present or visible after being absent, hidden, or unknown.
meanings_and_examples.example: Suddenly, the sun came out and lit up the room.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To approach in speech or writing; to mention or refer to a topic within conversation or text.
meanings_and_examples.example: Let's come back to the main point of our discussion about climate change.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To cause something to happen, typically by influencing it in some way.
meanings_and_examples.example: The heavy rain came and flooded the streets.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In sports or games, a player moves towards their opponent's goal area with the ball.
meanings_and_examples.example: When the basketball comes to you, make sure to shoot it into the hoop.
